New Records: LaMelo Ball is on pace to shatter the all-time record for fourth-quarter points per game, currently held by Russell Westbrook with 10.0 points per game in the 2016-17 season.
Key Match Events: Brandon Miller scored 17 of Charlotte's 23 points in the third quarter, helping the Hornets overcome a 64-51 deficit.
LaMelo Ball scored 17 points in the fourth quarter, finishing the game with 31 points.
